name: GUAR_ADDR_HX
description: This table holds the Accounts Receivable (EAR) related group 5000 pertaining to Guarantor Address Change History.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ADDR_CHANGE_DATE
columns.description: This column specifies the date on which the address change described on the rest of the row was performed.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_1
columns.description: This column contains the first line of a previous guarantor address.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_2
columns.description: This column contains the second line of a previous guarantor address.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_EXTRA
columns.description: This contains any additional lines for a previous guarantor address.

columns.name: CITY_HX
columns.description: This column contains the city for a previous address for this guarantor.

columns.name: STATE_HX_C_NAME
columns.description: This column contains the state for a previous address for this guarantor.

columns.name: ZIP_HX
columns.description: This column contains the ZIP code for a previous address for this guarantor.

columns.name: ADDR_CHANGE_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description: This column contains the context from which the address change was performed.
